personal_info.tagline: AI/ML Engineer | Generative AI | Machine Learning | Deep Learning | NLP | Computer Vision

professional_summary: Hitesh Kumar is a results-driven and innovative AI/ML Engineer with a deep passion for developing intelligent systems that solve real-world challenges. He possesses strong expertise in Generative AI, Natural Language Processing, and Computer Vision, specializing in the architecture of multi-agent AI systems and AI-powered automation. His technical foundation is built on Python, C++, Java, and SQL, complemented by extensive experience with frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, FastAPI, and Flask. Hitesh is a proven problem-solver, adept at deploying scalable AI models using modern MLOps and cloud technologies, and is committed to continuous learning and collaborative innovation in the field of machine intelligence.
